Its unfortunate that the team stopped making games and are only in it for the now a days for an example CS:GO with its skins and what not. But to the review and why i recommend any to buy this, has a fenomenal story line which you will like, i can almost gaurentee you will like this game. I love, love, love this game. It's so much fun, and far superior to lots of other games made more than a decade after. Still Valve's best work, in my opinion. Both an excellent standalone game and a very much improved sequel, and the graphs and animation hold up just fine.

I have a few things to say about this game. Overall: I'd reccomend. But personally wasn't THAT much into it. It might be because I JUST got into the half life series and haven't been caught up in nostalgia. Don't get me wrong I loved it... but there were a few things that really made it not enjoyable.

Pros:
Great & Interesting Story
  I really do love what's going on with game. Like I said, I JUST got into this series so I don't know anything about it or it's 
  major cliffhanger. But so far really enjoyable.
Loveable Characters
  Loveable (MAIN) Characters... the other npc's have the same like 3 voice actors haha which is funny and not really a 
  complaint. But the Squad Members aren't so loveable... and can go to hell. lol
Fun gameplay (only shooting and puzzles.. the driving really was horrific and too long)
  I enjoy how to game controls (somtimes) and how free moving it is. Shooting is nice and easy. The puzzles are fun and 
  rewarding when completed. Feels like you're actually doing something.
Soundtrack is decent
  Sometimes it's fun to shoot up stuff with the correct music, and I feel like they did well with this one.

Cons:
Driving in the Boat and Car (mainly the car)
  In a huge portion of the game you have to drive through lands of open nothingness, and you realize that theres really no 
  point to the part other than a way for them to explain how you get from once place to another.. it takes too long and is 
  hard to control, as well has a terrible close up first person point of view.
"Squad Following"
  This has to be the most annoying and frustrating part about this game. In the third act there's a part where a squad will 
  follow you. AND BEFORE YOU SAY ANYTHING... I KNOW YOU CAN MAKE THEM STOP. But Jesus Christ... it doesn't work. 
  When you are in a tight corner or take a wrong turn. BOOM. they'll be right there waiting for you, making it IMPOSSIBLE 
  to move anywhere. While you repeatedly hear "sorry doc" "my bad" "pardon me". It's annoying as anything and ruined a 
  lot of the expirence for me.

But other than that, I enjoyed this game and would reccomend it to others. At least give it a try. Everyone else loves this game to death, so why wouldn't you? (That's supposed to be rhetorical... but if not, it's cause those ****ing squads) lol
I loved this game... but I could care less if there was a Third Chapter, this game is golden though

Though I played MechWarrior 3, Worms, and Battlefield 1942 on the PC growing up, this was my first experience in PC single player games and cemented my love of PC gaming and made me determined to one day build a rig of my own. 

The gameplay, mechanics, and the voice acting blew me away. Having received this for Christmas in a pack with Half-Life Source and Counter-Strike Source from my parents, they had to pry me away from the screen. This game made me feel like a real PC gamer; a testament to what it showcases of this platform.

Бесспорно, Half-Life 2 — это один из лучших фантастических боевиков. И наконец — это уж классика. Если вы ещё не играли в неё, то я, в какой-то мере даже завидую вам. Вас ждут невероятные и очень интересные приключения. Я бы дорого заплатил, чтобы снова, как в первый раз, пройти её залпом, но, увы, каждый квадратный метр этого виртуального мира мне хорошо знаком.

I know I may be a bit late, but let me say this.
This game will forever live in fame as one of the best games in the world, with the best engine in the world.
The story's awesome, the mystery keeps making us wonder "Who is this guy? What are these soldiers doing on Earth? What happened during the 7 Hour War?"
The guns are amazing, and now that there's a whole universe dedicated to the alien/soldier-laden world of Half-Life is astonishing. I personally hope more fans use the Source Engine to create more amazing fan game, and further on advance the story of Gordan Freeman, and the fall of the Combine!
So, dear players, if you have the game still, play it again.
If you never even heard about this ever since it release, buy it.
Play it.
Experience...
A masterpiece.

Título obrigatório para qualquer gamer que se preze. Jogo de PC com a melhor nota do Metacritic até hoje, data desta análise. Na época em que foi lançado, seus gráficos, física, história e jogabilidade eram além do seu tempo.
Mesmo sendo antigo (16/11/2004), não deixou de ser atual, ainda vale a pena.
Pena que a Valve mercenária não faz o HL3, pois o custo-benefício (lucro) não é tão grande quanto o da $team :(.

Hier springt der Funke gleich rüber,

da ich bei Half-Life am Anfang so meine Schwierigkeiten hatte (siehe Review,) war ich hier sofort im Spiel. Na klar, die Grafik hatte inzwischen einen riesen Sprung gemacht und ist wenn man das Alter berücksichtigt bombastisch. Der Spielablauf war zum Vorgänger sowas von flüssig und meine ungeliebten Sprungeinlagen gingen sowas von der Hand, das ich diesmal nichts zu bemängeln hatte.

Die Geschichte ist ein Hammer und hat mich die ganze Zeit gefesselt, es war eine ware Freude wie sich Half-Life weiter entwickelt hatte. 

Da ich es für ein Appel und ein Ei im Sale bekommen habe (das große Paket), freue ich mich jetzt die einzelnen Episoden zu Spielen. Auch wenn ich viele Jahre hinterher hinke, bin ich ein großer Fan dieser Reihe geworden.

Wer sich die Zeit auf angenehme Weise vertreiben will, kann hier meiner Meinung nach nichts falsch machen und am besten wartet man bis es im Sale ist.

Spent 5 hours to finish the game.
Spend next 10 hours on d1_canals_07 to d1_canals_11
Get Hungry for some Milo
Walk out door
...






Initiate an accelerated backhop out d1_drive_way_01 and transition into accelerated sidehops approaching d1_back_streets_01.
 
Continue sidehopping down d1_back_streets_01 avoiding car, trailer, and smallchildren props until you arrive at d1_main_street_01.

At d1_main_street_01, locate a Tree_Branch prop and slam it into the heads of the NPCs waiting at the bus stop. Repeat attempts may be necessary to trigger the Bus Depart Cutscene quicker.

Once the Bus Depart Trigger is hit, cross the road, avoiding any more car props. Failure to avoid these props will result in immediate death as they have rather large kill boxes around them. Move onto d1_main_street_02.

From the start of d1_main_street_02, start your set up by standing next to the arbritary railing in the middle of the path and looking back towards "Welcome to [INSERT TOWN NAME HERE] sign, lining it up at the top right corner of the sign. 

Start a crouching accelerated back hop, the set up will path you through the 3 bollards where you will trigger a crazed_ice_addict NPC who will attmpet to ask you for $2 for the bus. By hitting this trigger with enough speed you bypass the need to fight off the addict with your crowbar. This skip saves about 5 seconds in a run.

At the top of d1_hill_01 make a quicksave then continue the crouching accelerated backhop down d1_hill_01, making sure that you have at least 1800 Hammer Units of speed before the hill's decent to land in d1_local_pool_01 that is past all 7 side streets. If you drop below 1200 speed, hit your quickload key and start again as failure to do so will result infalling short of the local_pool and taking lethal fall damage. The back up strat is to just bhop blindly down the hill and hope that no cars come out of the side streets.

Once in d1_local_pool_01, grab a pool_noodle from the drowning_toddler NPC and prop climb out of the deep end and start another crouching accelerated side/backhop towards the fence located at the d1_footy_oval_01. Locate the beach_ball prop located in the corner and prop climb again, making sure not to get caught on the barbed-wire fencing. (Doing this skips the d1_local_pool_02 exit trigger which inturn bypasses the trigger to load NPCs and Props in d1_footy_oval_01)

Once over the fence, line yourself up between the two uprights and start an accelerated backhop, hitting the angled mound at the opposite end of the field will launch you into the air and allow you to land on the sloped roof of d2_local_IGA_01. Crouch at the top of the roof and uncrouch before you hit the ground to negate fall damage.

Go inside the building and turn left, remember to wall ride while bhopping to get to the Milo faster. Reverse your movements while wallriding still and make it to the Cash Register. Using the Milo_Can prop, bash any customerm NPCS over the head to trigger their departure quicker. Interact with the cashier NPC. You cant skip this part as it softlocks the game if you fail to hit the payment trigger.

Once back outside of d2_local_IGA_01, use the pedestrian crossing to reach d2_local_IGA_02. From this point its all about your accelerated backhopping skills up the hill. Avoid any pedestrians and cars from the side streets until you reach the top of d2_hill_01. 

Once at the top of d2_hill_01, transition into an accelerated sidehop so that you can see the 3 bollards and path past them. As you enter d2_main_street_01, conserve your speed past them and cross the street where you triggered the bus cutscene in d1_main_street_01. 

Keeping your speed, manoeuvre down d2_back_streets_01 until you reach d2_drive_way_01. Once underneith the carport, jump onto the bonnet of the car that you would normally have used to drive down to d2_local_IGA_01 and schrodinger's jump over your gate. This saves like 1 second. 

Once over the fence, sprint to the door and open it and sprint again to the freezer. Open up the freezer and grab ice_cream_tub and go to the cupboard and grab deep_bowl. Equip your crowbar and use it to pry open the tin lid off the Milo, and smack the foil covering until it breaks. This is marginally faster than grabbing the desert_spoon form the cutlery draw first because the desert_spoon takes 4 extra frames to pry open the lid and 20 more frames to puncture the foil covering. Using desert_spoon, dig out half of the ice_cream_tub into deep_bowl and tip the milo_tin upside down over the ice_cream_bowl. 

Congratulations, you beat the game. If you were quick enough you can get back in time to watch the 6am news and enjoy the rest of the day speedrunning d1_canals_07 to d1_canals_11 endlessly.

The best game in my library, hands down. If you could have only one game, this should be it. 3.14/3.14 gold stars. 

I dont understand why Valve wont invest time into a new sequel. Seriously, why leave us with an unfinished story? I dont care if the script for a sequel was released, I want to PLAY that and INTERACT with it, not merely read it. Them saying "its never going to happen" is a gut shot to the industry and the fanbase. Thank you for making a great game, but also screw you for not following up on it.
